channel.title: DJ Marky Mark's podcast
channel.description:
Marky Marks podcast feature his Jazz 60 show featuring Jazz of all forms from 1960 to 2K. The show is broadcast by syndication to various stations across the world at various times and Mark's Walking in Rhythm Show which is broadcast every Monday form 6pm
For show broadcast and all other info please go to: www.djmarkymark.info Calling all radio stations! if you wish to broadcast this podcast as the title suggest its contains various styles of jazz, mostly 2k and last 60 mins long.It will be podcasted from my site and will contain ads for my forthcoming events. If you wish to use the podcast on your station at what ever time you wish please contact me! The stations that broadcast it will get mentioned during the show...contact me clactonsoulweekender@gmail.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Jazz, Funk & Soul from Marky Mark
channel.itunes:author: Marky Mark

item.title: Jazz60 10th February 2012
item.description: Playlist 10th Feb 201 2012 Jazz 60 show featuring Jazzy rhythms, funky beats and soulful vibes Ballistic Brothers - cubafro con amigos - 2009 Louie Vega feat. Blaze & Raúl Midón - Sunshine (Sacred Rhythm Mix)- 2004 Deep Xcape and Dolls Combers - Brazilica (Main Mix) (2 Shades Of Deep EP) - 2011 Diesler-revelations_(jazzinvaders_remix) - 2009 Club Des Belugas - Papaya - 2009 Fuminori Kagajo feat. Adeola Ranson - Piece Of Heaven (Sean McCabe Paradise Vox Mix) - 2010 DJ Christos pres. Ree Morris - Inside Of Me (Ralf GUM Remix) - 2011 Luis Radio & Raffa Scoccia - Organismo (Original mix) - 2004 Fuzion ft Kenny Bobien - I'm Free (The Latin Rhythm Vox) - 2011 Glen Lewis “Life Everlasting” (Dennis Ferrer’s Passion Of C Mixes) -2005

item.title: "Groove Theory" 9th February 2012
item.description: "Groove Theory" show JFS Radio featuring Jazzy rhythms, funky beats and soulful vibes 2012 to 1970 "Groove Theory" show is sponsored by Salou Soul Weekender 6th - 11th of September in Spain more info www.salousoul.info Azymuth - Jazz Carnival Dance Grooves Aquarium Dream - Your A Star Harvey Mason - On and On The Latest - Starting over Nu Grooves 45- Expansions Robert Strauss. - Classic Lady Nu Soul R. Kelly - Share My Love Godwin - So In Love Black Ivory - Lucky Tonight Jazz60 New Jazz on the block Gregory Porter - On My Way To Harlem Newer grooves revisted Kindred The Family Soul - Magic Happen Jazzanova - Rockin' YouEternally (Feat. Leon_Ware_And_Dwele) Salou Soul Weekender Poolside Selection Imperials - Whose goona love me when your gone O'Jays - I love music The real thing -Children of the ghetto Salou Soul Weekender Hip shaker Jazz Selection Tania Maria - Come with me Grooves Revisted Darlene Davis - I found lovin Lisa Lisa Cult jam - Let the beat hit em Richard Darbyshire - This I Swear (David Morales and Frankie Knuckles) Fonda Rae - Touch me Royal Delight - I'll be a freak for you Raw Silk - Do it to the music Greg Henderson - Dreamin Check out

item.title: Walking in Rhythm show JFS Radio 30th Jan 2012
item.description: Walking in Rhythm show JFS Radio featuring Jazzy rhythms, funky beats and soulful vibes Hour 1 Loose Ends - Dial 999 Teddy Pendergrass - The more I want O'jays - I love music Howard Johnson - So Fine Melba Moore - Make your mind up tonight Tony Lee - Reach out Armenta - I wanna be with you Unique - What I got is what I want Skyy - Show me the way Hour 2 Lynne Collins - Think War - Me and my baby brother Roy Ayers - Love will bring us back together Fatback - Do the Bus stop Ruben Wilson - Got to get your own Eastside connection - Your so right for me Kinky Fox - So different Logg - I know you will Leeroy Burgess - Heartbreaker Linda Clifford - Ruaway Love
item.dc:creator: Marky Mark
item.itunes:summary:
Walking in Rhythm show JFS Radio featuring Jazzy rhythms, funky beats and soulful vibes
Hour 1 Loose Ends - Dial 999 Teddy Pendergrass - The more I want O'jays - I love music Howard Johnson - So Fine Melba Moore - Make your mind up tonight Tony Lee - Reach out Armenta - I wanna be with you Unique - What I got is what I want Skyy - Show me the way
Hour 2 Lynne Collins - Think War - Me and my baby brother Roy Ayers - Love will bring us back together Fatback - Do the Bus stop Ruben Wilson - Got to get your own Eastside connection - Your so right for me Kinky Fox - So different Logg - I know you will Leeroy Burgess - Heartbreaker Linda Clifford - Ruaway Love

item.title: Jazz60 20th January 2012
